Carrier
Unit
Faction: Human (CESO)
Role: Transport & Weapons Platform
Sight range: 37
Footprint: 8x8 irregular
Build
Cost: 218 146
Build from: Mech
Build time: 45s
Requires: Research Aerospace,
Active Comm Center
Build hotkey: C
Offence
Attack strength: H.E. AntiMatter Missiles:
53-57 vs. all
Attack frequency: 1/1.2s vs. ground
1/1.6s vs. air
Avg. damag./s. 44.2/s vs. ground
33.6/s vs. air
Attack range: 27 vs. all
Splash damage: 4 vs. all
Damage Modifiers: 55.3/s to Tank
Defence
Health: 550
Damage taken: 11.5/s(from 8.4/s) from MFB
Movement: Medium, 6 sq/sec
Ability
Abilities: Transport

Heal carried units: 15HP/5s

Capacity: 60


The Carrier is a large unit, which is built by the Mech. It has the ability to transport units and Resource Containers. However, it is virtually never used in practice because troops can be transported more easily by teleporting, and it is too slow and weak for Crate stealing to be viable.
